name: zuby
description: Full-stack application with Next.js frontend and Express.js backend
author: zubairalibaig

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
